title: Intermediate Vocabulary Expansion Program Using Web-Based Spaced Repetition

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English vocabulary proficiency (TOEIC 600+ or equivalent)
context.additional_context: Job-seeking-focused vocational social-domain vocabulary enhancement course, simulating real workplace scenarios in VR to contextualize vocabulary usage.

learning_goals: Learners can identify 200 intermediate-level social studies vocabulary items presented in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a long-term vocabulary retention rate of over 70% after four weeks through a Spaced Repetition System (SRS).
Learners can communicate using 150 target vocabulary items contextually appropriate in virtual interview/meeting scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
